application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
John Spencer Square (various locations within communal area - see site plan)
(TPO ref - TPO 299/2006. Nos in brackets below = TPO tree ref)

T454(T5) Common lime - Minor deadwood throughout crown <10%. Remove epicormic regrowth on main stem. Reduce crown back to previous pruning points (remove approx 2-4m)

T455(T4) Common lime - Remove major hanging deadwood at 7.0m. Remove epicormic regrowth. Carry out crown reduction back to previous pruning points (removing approx 2-3m property side and 1m from height)

T458(T7) Sycamore - Target prune southern crown to create 2m clearance from building

T459(T8) Indian horse chestnut - Reduce by 1-1.5m regrowth from previous crown reduction and crown thin re-growth by 20%

T460(T13) Sycamore - Remove major deadwood within crown

T462(T14) Bird cherry - Remove central dead leader

T463(T15) Norway maple - Sever girdling root at base. 

T468(T9) Sycamore - Remove epicormic regrowth establishing on main stem. Target prune western crown to create 2m clearance from building

T469(T1) Common lime - Re-pollard lower crown back to previous points

T470(T2) Common lime - Remove epicormic regrowth. Re-pollard back to previous points

T471(T3) Common lime - Re-pollard back to previous points. Remove epicormic regrowth
